properties.name: monitor.schedule.cron
properties.description: cron expression for the scheduled monitor cycle. Defaults to 'every 10 minutes'.

properties.name: monitor.schedule.inteval.minutes
properties.description: Within this window configs are considered valid, a config is tested if it's 'last checked' time is beyond this threshold. Defaults to 12 hours.

properties.name: monitor.aws.region
properties.description: aws region this service is operating in.

properties.name: monitor.aws.accessKey.id
properties.description: Access Key ID for the aws account this service is running on.

properties.name: monitor.aws.accessKey.value
properties.description: Access Key for the aws account this service is running on.
